mapper.select: select tb1.*,isnull(r.MENUID) checked from(select m1.*,m2.MENUICON c_icon,m2.MENUID c_id,m2.MENUNAME c_name,m2.MENU_URL c_url,m2.PARENTID c_pid from menuinfo m1,menuinfo m2 where m1.MENUID = m2.PARENTID) tb1 left JOIN (select * from rolemenu where roleId = #{roleId}) r on tb1.c_id = r.MENUID

select m1.*,m2.MENUICON c_icon,m2.MENUID c_id,m2.MENUNAME c_name,m2.MENU_URL c_url,m2.PARENTID c_pid from menuinfo m1,menuinfo m2 where m2.MENUID in( select MENUID from (select ur.* from userinfo u,user_role ur,roleinfo r where u.USERID = ur.USERID and ur.ROLEID = r.ROLEID and u.USERID = #{userId} ) tb1 LEFT JOIN rolemenu rm on tb1.roleid = rm.ROLEID GROUP BY MENUID) and m1.MENUID = m2.PARENTID
